title: Lancôme Classic Makeup Style How-To Tutorial
description:
Discover the makeup artist in you. Find everything you need to create infinitely luminous and sensationally smooth Lancôme eye and lip looks. 
Shop Lancôme at HSN: https://www.hsn.com/shop/lancome/2810

asset.title: Get the look: Lancome Classic Makeup Style How-To Tutorial
asset.description:
Shop Lancôme on HSN.com: http://www.hsn.com/beauty/lancome_c-bs_a-2810_xc.aspx
Discover the makeup artist in you. Find everything you need to create infinitely luminous and sensationally smooth Lancôme eye and lip looks. This HSN-exclusive color cosmetics selection is sure to take your makeup application from so-so to show-stopping!  Learn style tips from Amy Morrison in this demonstration of how-to apply the full routine, and get a classic trend setting look with Lancome, using La Base Pro, Teint Idole, Aquatique, Blush Subtil, Color Design Shadow and Liner Palette, Hypnose Drama, Juicy Tubes.
asset.author: HSN
